list_translation_mean.translate_mean: thước để đo cất nhà cửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: ascertain the size, amount, or degree of (something) by using an instrument or device marked in standard units or by comparing it with an object of known size.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the amount of water collected is measured in pints
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lượng nước thu được được đo bằng pint

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: estimate or assess the extent, quality, value, or effect of (something).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it is hard to measure teaching ability
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thật khó để đo lường khả năng giảng dạy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: travel over (a certain distance or area).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we must measure twenty miles today
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chúng ta phải đo hai mươi dặm ngày hôm nay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a plan or course of action taken to achieve a particular purpose.
a standard unit used to express the size, amount, or degree of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a furlong is an obsolete measure of length
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một furlong là một thước đo dài lỗi thời

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a certain quantity or degree of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the states retain a large measure of independence
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các quốc gia giữ lại một biện pháp độc lập lớn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the rhythm of a piece of poetry or a piece of music.
